snippet.title: Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters - (SAGE 2021) Trailer
snippet.description:
Coé manitos blz? Seguinte Hoje é dia de revelação do outro fangame no qual eu estava desenvolvendo e esse era o Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters! O jogo sairá em Agosto junto com a SAGE 2021.Sim estamos na SAGE desse ano!Conto com sua presença lá! :D
 O game tem uma gameplay tag system 3x3 no maior estilo MvC, espero que gostem! Se inscreva se não for inscrito, compartilhe e deixo o like! Fiquem com Deus e Fui! :D
___________________________________________________________________________

Hello guys! Welcome to my trailer for my new fangame for Sage 2021,called Ultimate Sonic Heroes Fighters! This new game version contains a battle style gameplay with 3x3 tags (Marvel vs Capcom game style) In addition to being able to change characters during gameplay, it is possible to make combos by stitching with specials and combos of your selected characters. Hope you like the trailer! Leave the like and subscribe if you are not registered, stay with God and I went! :D

Game Download: https://gamejolt.com/games/USHF/438466

Facebook:https://www.facebook.com/CorrupiaoGames/

Grupo do facebook de Megaman/Megaman facebook group:https://www.facebook.com/groups/1414860018735017/

Grupo de Criadores Mugen/Mugen group:https://www.facebook.com/groups/9023665031942

Channel Blog:https://corrupiaolenda.blogspot.com/p/blog-page_4.html
